BeforeMovie.Text: I can't say I'm a fan of comedies, but this film shows promise.$1

AfterMovie.Text: *chuckle* That little sapling left an impression on me.$5

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah! There's healthy options here. I was afraid there would only be sweets.$1

AfterMovie.Text: The world is too big for one tale to tell.$5

BeforeMovie.Text: There's something special about that crane machine...$0
The birds bring a unique ambience...$5
Ah. A horror film. We shall see just how 'scary' it is.$0

AfterMovie.Text: Those youngsters have the heart and courage to become adventurers some day.$0

DuringMovie.Text: I was once stranded in a snow storm...$5

AfterMovie.Text: Stardrops are fascinating fruits.$1#$b#Perhaps one day I'll teach you more about them.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I once visited Zuzu City to represent the First Slash at an important shareholder meeting.$0#$b#I wore my special red and black garb. I remember it as if it were yesterday.$1#$b#*chuckle* Even adventurers need financing, @.$5

AfterMovie.Text: That film wasn't what I perceived it to be...$2

Entries.Lance_Text: Cultivate crop seeds obtained by monsters in the highlands to aid Layla her research.
Entries.Lance_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a spring monster crop to Layla.
Entries.Lance_Objective_2_Text: Deliver a summer monster crop to Layla.
Entries.Lance_Objective_0_Text: Deliver a fall monster crop to Layla.
Entries.Lance_Objective_3_Text: Deliver a winter monster crop to Layla.

I'm afraid I can't commit to helping Layla's research. I have my own responsibilities in the valley.#$b#I believe a quest of this stature is up your alley though, @."

Entries.LanceMetKrobus: Hmm? You unveiled Krobus to Layla?$0#$e#I suppose it was only a matter of time. I Trust the both of you.$0
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)773: Can never have too many life elixirs on hand!
Entries.structureBuilt_Slime Hutch: There's a man named 'Gideon' from Castle Village who's also a slime rancher. I feel like you two would get along well.$0
Entries.Wed4: I scout the mines several times a week, trying to gauge monster populations.$0#$e#Wouldn't want too many of them grouped up. They could start trickling out of the caves into the valley.$1
Entries.summer_Sat6: During the time I've spent traveling and fighting monsters, I've come across many interesting people.$0#$e#Some of the most interesting are here in this valley. Including you, of course.$2
Entries.fall_15: Heard news from Mayor Lewis. There's many tourists visiting Pelican Town tomorrow for the festival.$0#$e#I get nervous around large crowds.$2
Entries.marlon_event4: Yes, there are. The further down you go, the more monsters you'll encounter that have been...#$b#That have been corrupted for many years. It gives them supernatural strength.
Entries.married_Lance: What a surprise. You and Layla... Hah.$0#$e#Congratulations, @.

Entries.funReturn_Lance: Sometimes I feel like I rely too much on mana elixirs...$2#$e#I need to grow stronger.$3#$e#%Layla looks intense.

Entries.Forest_98_91: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you and Layla...$0#$e#I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling.$0

Entries.married_Lance: I heard news about your wedding. Congratulations! Layla is a fine and talented mage.#$b#You two will explore all our world has to offer, if you're willing to enter the unknown.$0

Entries.1000032/f Willy 1250/z winter/z spring/z: ocean/-500 -500/farmer 24 35 1 Willy 37 35 2 Lewis 12 39 2 Marnie 13 39 2/skippable/showFrame Willy 25/viewport 37 36 true/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "How incredible!"/move farmer 9 0 1/pause 800/showFrame Willy 24/pause 250/pause 500/move Willy 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Willy "Ahoy there, @.$0#$b#I just landed a real whopper!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Willy "Here, let me show you.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "I know how you feel, Marnie."/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 350/addObject 36 35 159/playSound fishSlap/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 400/speak Willy "This beauty is called a 'Crimsonfish'!$1#$b#Theyâ€™re a rare species thatâ€™s disappearinâ€™ from these parts, sadly.$0#$b#Thereâ€™s a notion going around that theyâ€™re dying off on account of recent pollution from Joja.$2#$b#Since their factories started cropping up across the Ferngill Republic, Crimsonfish populations have dropped off.$2"/pause 900/removeSprite 36 35/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 400/playSound openBox/pause 250/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 500/speak Willy "I was just about to release her.$1#$b#I don't want to put these rare treasures in any more danger than they are already, even though I could make some good coin sellin' her.$2"/pause 1500/speak Willy "Sure am happy Iâ€™m able to show her to someone. People donâ€™t always believe my fish stories.$1"/pause 1150/emote Willy 40/pause 600/speak Willy "It's times like these I feel like I should invest in purchasing a camera.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 600/move Willy -1 0 3/pause 600/speak Willy "So...$0"/pause 50/speak Willy "#$q -1 null#How's the fishin' life been treatin' ya?#$r -1 0 willy_event1#I'll fish every now and again.#$r -1 0 willy_event2#I fish at every opportunity I have.#$r -1 0 willy_event3#I haven't picked up my fishing rod in a while."/pause 1250/faceDirection Willy 2/pause 600/speak Willy "If you squint, you can just about see the Fern Islands across the ocean on a nice day like this.$0#$b#My family is from those islands. We should take a boat out there sometime!$1#$b#Away from the cities the water is crystal clear, and there are some amazing rare fish that are native to the islands.$1#$b#The ring fruit grown on the islands are also delicious! I've been craving a good ring fruit lately.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 1000/speak Willy "I'm going to keep on anglin' and toss this Crimsonfish back so she can go on her way.$0#$b#Have a pleasant day, @.$1"/pause 600/move Willy 1 0 2/pause 600/showFrame Willy 24/pause 300/showFrame Willy 25/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Willy 50/end dialogue Willy "I released her back into the ocean.$1#$b#We all need to do our part to make sure we don't tip the balance of nature.$0"

Entries.LanceLifeElixirs: Dear @,^^Enclosed in this crate are 24 life elixirs. The highlands are teeming with danger around every corner. These will help keep you safe.^^ -Layla %item object 773 24 %%[#]Layla's Elixirs

Entries.JenkinsHouse.38: "Grampleton - Travel Guide"^^(This book interests you. You glance through the pages)^^Hmm... there are many images of golden fields of wheat, windmills, artisans, and a large community of happy people. The trees surrounding the city are huge.
Entries.HighlandsOutpost.1: It's a research novel Layla is writing.

Entries.MarlonFay_y2: When we catch these monsters, we have to figure out a balance between which will be interesting to look at, and which are safe enough to keep in the town.$1#$e#No matter how strong the cages are, you have to be prepared.

Entries.CommunityDay_Harvey: A lot of people think there's some magical food you can eat to boost your metabolism, but it's really just about eating a balanced diet.$0
Entries.CommunityDay_Harvey_Married: The food that we grow on our farm makes for a great start to a balanced diet, which is the key to a healthy metabolism.$0#$b#And since we grow it all organically, it tastes great, too.$1

Entries.Tue2: I have a giant stack of accounting to get through today.$0#$b#Lots of people think paperwork is boring. I wouldn't call it exciting, but I do like to see the numbers balance out when we're running the store efficiently.$4

Entries.breakUp: I believe that's... for the best.$2#$e#It's hard to have a relationship when you don't see each other often...$2
Entries.divorced: I thought we'd grow old together...$2#$e#%Layla turns away from you.
Entries.Tue10: *yawn*...$5#$b#I didn't get much sleep last night. I was exploring the mountains.$0#$e#*yawn*...$5#$b#I feel like I could just rest my head in your lap...$5#$e#%Layla is dozing off.
